forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 63F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 63F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 54F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 64F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 64F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 63F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 54F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 61F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low around 10C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 51F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 58F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
